text: Roger Hugh Charles Donlon (born January 30, 1934, died January 25, 2024) is a former United States Army officer. He is the first person to receive the Medal of Honor in the Vietnam War, as well as the first member of the U.S. Army Special Forces so honored. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1934 births Category:Living people Category:Medal of Honor recipients Category:Military people from New York (state)
title: Roger Donlon
